alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jackson; Coastal Matagorda; Inland Jackson; Inland Matagorda; Matagorda Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 14 at 9:51AM CST until January 14 at 11:00AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 6 PM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter mile or less in areas of dense fog. Northwest winds increasing to 20 to 30 mph with gusts of 40 to 45 mph possible. * WHERE...Inland Jackson, Inland Matagorda, Inland Brazoria, Coastal Jackson, Coastal Matagorda, Coastal Brazoria, Matagorda Islands and Brazoria Islands Counties. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 11 AM CST this morning. For the Wind Advisory, from 3 AM to 6 PM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jackson; Coastal Matagorda; Inland Jackson; Inland Matagorda; Matagorda Islands
